All you need is :     Bachelors degree in Science/IT/Computing or equivalent   2-4 years of experience in writing software code in at least one programming language   2-3 years of knowledge in C, Unix/Linux, Database   Strong communication skills   Prior experience in Amdocs Ensemble will be an added advantage.
